LanguageData.UnTurned.title: mutant
LanguageData.UnTurnedRich.title: mutant
LanguageData.UnRaider.title: raider
LanguageData.UnRaider.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is cut from the same cloth as the rest of the herd.
LanguageData.UnThrall.title: thrall
LanguageData.UnThrall.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] scrapes by as a menial thrall.
LanguageData.UnGrunt.title: grunt
LanguageData.UnGrunt.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is average rough and vile ungor. A lower cast of beastmen that lives of the scraps of the herd.
LanguageData.UnWild.title: wildling
LanguageData.UnWild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a mutant. Left in the wilds like so many other mutant children. Picked up by a nearby gor herd that heard the mutant child calling.
LanguageData.UnOutcast.title: outcast
LanguageData.UnOutcast.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a mutant, but was never chased out of the village. [PAWN_nameDef] lived life in the outskirts never loved yet never fully despised.
LanguageData.UnCared.title: cared for
LanguageData.UnCared.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a mutant, but the parents could never muster the courage to leave [PAWN_nameDef] in the wood like so many other did. [PAWN_nameDef] was cared for through childhood but the future looked bleak since [PAWN_nameDef] parents coudn't protect it forever.
LanguageData.UnStrange.title: strange child
LanguageData.UnStrange.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a mutant. Abandoned like so many other mutants [PAWN_nameDef] was left to fend for itself in a passing gor herd. [PAWN_nameDef] was a stranger than the rest of the mutant children, a mind touched by chaos throwing [PAWN_nameDef] into mania from time to time.
LanguageData.UnChild.title: farm child
LanguageData.UnChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't born as a mutant. [PAWN_nameDef] lived life as a farmers child. [PAWN_nameDef] was later in life corrupted by chaos. When fleeing for its life [PAWN_nameDef] came across a gor herd passing by and joined the lower cast like the rest of the ungors.
LanguageData.UnChildRich.title: rich child
LanguageData.UnChildRich.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't born as a mutant. [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a rich family. Spending childhood studying the arts of a aristocrat. [PAWN_nameDef] was later in life corrupted by chaos. When fleeing for its life [PAWN_nameDef] came across a gor herd passing by and joined the lower cast like the rest of the ungors.
